Description:
6 Acres-Suite horses, and 2 Houses!
Lots of options here, Rolling grassland, well fenced for horses or similar, delightful location, beautiful garden. Close to the Cockatoo Montessori school. The main house is a 3 bedroom brick veneer with en suite bathroom, and the character filled mud brick cottage is quite separate and self contained. There is a double garage in brick to match the house and a paved outdoor area. The road access is very easy and the northern aspect gives great light and panoramic and uninterrupted views of the Yarra Valley Ranges. This would be a great place to call home or an excellent rental return with the two individual dwellings easily lettable.
Contact Anthony Moyes 0413 581 168
or
For information on this property call 9841 8000
Melways Ref:312 C 3

Description:
A Cut Above The Rest
This stunning brick home offers the lucky purchasers a wonderful but rare opportunity to purchase a near new home in a quiet & highly sought after location. Open plan living, light filled living areas, soothing colour schemes and a spacious kitchen offering stainless steel appliances with huge walk in pantry will impress you upon inspection. Boasting 2 separate living areas, separate dining area, gas ducted heating, reverse cycle heating & cooling, master with ensuite & walk in robe plus there is a double carport, large decked entertaining area, circular drive all set on a flat 1/4 acre allotment you can be sure the whole family will love living here. Call us today, you will not be disappointed....
Justin Barrot : 0438 683 781

Description:
Wow! Flat, sunny 1417m2 allotment with sealed road access!!!
If you have been looking for the perfect position to build the home of your dreams, then look no further! Boasting sealed road access this almost flat, sunny 1417m2 allotment offers the ideal opportunity for those who are looking for a quiet country life but still within easy access to the shops, schools, sporting clubs & transport. All services available, fenced on 3 sides plus there is a lovely private aspect to enjoy. Call today - this is the block you have been searching for!

Description:
MUST BE SOLD!!!
This beautifully presented character cottage warmly welcomes its new owners to a wonderfully relaxing lifestyle. Spend your time doing the things you enjoy read a book on the shady verandah & admire the view, meditate in total peace & quiet or potter around the garden with the sounds of local birdlife in the distance, whatever you decide the choice is yours. Perfectly presented & boasting 3 large bedrooms, gas ducted heating plus gas log fire, spacious kitchen, polished floorboards & lovely Austrian curtains. Outside there is a sealed driveway, double carport, storage areas, fully fenced yard, thriving veggie patch, water tank & a sunny yard for the kids & pets to play. Located within a few minutes drive to the shops, transport & school, 'Amber Cottage' will be everything you have been looking for!!!!
Lana Maher : 0408 535 075

Description:
A little bit of Tuscany in Gembrook (Private Inspections Available)
Set in a delightful neighbourhood of Gembrook with views of farmland from the front and light bushland to the rear, we introduce this private, super practical 3 bedroom 2 bathroom brick veneer family home with double garage under roofline.
Two large living spaces for you to create your family zones. The lounge room has a brick open fireplace to cosy up to and the great sized kitchen, meals and family is warmed by a small wood fire. The master has a walk through wardrobe into the ensuite. Two further bedrooms both with BIR. Polished wood floors throughout.
Everything is neat, clean and fresh - ready for new owners to inject their spirit.
The house is set well back from Williamson Road and has mature landscaping around a circular driveway. The exterior brick is offset by trims and posts in hues of Ancient Ruin and Woodland Grey. The glorious gardens extend to the rear of the property enjoyed from the Tuscan-like patio framed by trailing grapevines. An outdoor spa awaits your evenings - living it up, Italiano style.
Fruit trees abound alongside herbaceous and perennial plantings in the garden beds beyond - grapefruit, lime, apple, lemon and cumquat. A level grassed area and a decent garden shed for mower and more. The backyard is fully fenced with a separate fenced area waiting for your chickens.
Insights: 43 Williamson Road, Gembrook VIC 3783 was last sold in 2009 and 9 other 3 bedroom house in Gembrook have recently been sold.

Description:
Brand New on Grandview!
Opportunity exists to secure this renovated and beautifully styled 4 bedroom home set on almost 1 & ½ natural acres.
Set well back off the street, the home welcomes you onto the wide, timber wrapped veranda that provides different aspects of the property as you walk around. A tiled entrance draws you into the spacious lounge room with neutral carpet and copious amounts of morning sun streaming through the front windows.
Wooden bi fold doors with frosted glass lead you to the adjacent 2nd living and dining areas, and the kitchen which can also be accessed directly from a doorway in the front foyer. These areas feature dark polished floors with stunning border detail and also get the morning sun. The wood heater with slate hearth completes the ambiance.
The kitchen is beautifully renovated with stainless steel appliances, classic white tiles and cabinetry, and delightful timber bench tops that expertly achieve the delicate balance between country comfort, contemporary style and textural distinction.
The 4 bedrooms are located off the hallway which runs from the kitchen to the rear of the home. The master bedroom is robed and features its own semi ensuite while the other bedrooms are conveniently located near the huge main bathroom.
Both the laundry and dining area have exits to the veranda which overlook the gorgeous solar heated, in ground pool with mineral 'Magnapool' system, and entertaining area; the perfect place to relax and entertain with family and friends over those warm summer months.
The property is fully fenced and has a sealed off street parking bay with provisions for charging of electric vehicles, plus a sealed, gated driveway that leads to an under house, double lock up garage to which double sliding doors have been fitted to create an art studio, home office, large family room or extra bedrooms.
The home is completed by gas ducted heating, evaporative air conditioning, water tanks, a garden shed and landscaped gardens.
Move in with nothing to do but relax and enjoy the home and the land.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Samantha Scott 0438 680 032 or Aaron Day 0407 365 994
Please note: All property details shown are correct at time of publishing. Some properties may have been sold in the preceding 24 hours and we recommend that you confirm open for inspection times with the listing agent direct or the listing office

Description:
PRIVATE, FLAT, SUNNY WITH VIEWS AND A BIG SHED!
****Due to COVID-19 pandemic and current Metro stage 4 restrictions none of our properties are able to be attended for physical inspections. Please contact the listing agent for alternative virtual inspections and other viewing options.**** Thank you for your understanding!
If peace and quiet are what youre after and you want to escape the rat-race, here is the property for you. Privately located on a no-through road a short drive to Emerald, this flat and sunny 3086m2 block (3/4 acre approx.) is absolutely ideal for your next home.
The low maintenance brick and tile home offer 3 robed bedrooms with 1 bathroom, large lounge room with separate family room and kitchen with dishwasher. Off the house is a lovely deck to enjoy winter afternoons and take in the view to the rolling hillsides.
Special features include the split system, electric panel heaters and a 4kW solar panel system.
Outside there is an 8x7m garage with high 3.6m clearance ideal for a caravan, plus a separate pergola which doubles as a carport providing undercover access to the house. Additionally, there is plenty of available parking for any other vehicles or space for the kids, animals or do whatever you please!
Opportunities like this in this street do not come around very often, so dont delay, as this property will sell!
Please contact Mick Dolphin on 0429 684522 or Janet Hawkins on 0409 117 432 to arrange your inspection today.
https://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Location, Location, Location!
**CURRENTLY AVAILABLE FOR VIEWING BY DIGITAL MEDIA ONLY. CONTACT BETHANY DAY 0438 844 968 OR AARON DAY 0407 365 994 FOR MORE INFORMATION**
Magnificently set on almost an acre of stunning land, this residence surpasses all expectations. From the moment you drive in, the home captivates with wall to wall windows and an impressive second level balcony that fills you with anticipation.
Double red doors form a unique entry into the first level of the home where you are instantly drawn to the chimney inset wood heater in the spacious formal lounge with exposed brick walls and polished floorboards. Perfect for entertaining, the dining area separates the lounge from the kitchen which has a 900mm cooktop and oven and unique triangular island bench that provides plenty of room to cook up a storm.
For comfort and convenience there is also a powder room and separate toilet on this level.
Tucked neatly behind the chimney is a lovely staircase leading up to the second level of the home where the wooden balustrade compliments the exposed brick and feature shingle wall, creating a distinctive and warming character.
Here you will find the second living area with access to the balcony that has the most pleasant views over the front yard and into the golf course beyond.
There are also 4 good sized bedrooms, the master equipped with ensuite and walk in robe. The remaining bedrooms are all robed and serviced by a tastefully renovated bathroom.
The laundry on this level is on the far side of a large tiled sunroom with ducted heating, making it the perfect place to dry the washing during the cooler months. During the warmer months this drying room has direct access outside, and due to the extraordinary undulation of the land there are no stairs to descend.
This rear yard is terraced and only inclines either side of the home so that the front and rear yards are almost flat. Furthermore, thoughtful construction allows for vehicular access to the rear.
The sealed driveway from the street meanders through gardens peppered with ornamental trees and wildlife attracting shrubs before arriving at the triple carport in front of the large double lock up garage with internal access to the home.
The distinctive features of this home make it aesthetically pleasing, spacious and contented while still capturing the essence of warmth and relaxation.
Calming views and quiet, convenient location make this property a must see!
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION!
Bethany Day 0438 844 968 or Aaron Day 0407 365 994

Description:
Location at its Finest!
***CURRENTLY AVAILABLE FOR VIEWING BY DIGITAL MEDIA ONLY. CONTACT BETHANY DAY 0438 844 968 FOR MORE INFORMATION***
Located in a blue ribbon street, situated behind a pretty picket fence and within easy walking distance to the Emerald shops, doctors, school & transport, is this tidy, low maintenance brick veneer home. The 2 Bedroom home, with sub-divisional potential (STCA) on just under a ¼ acre, offers a fantastic opportunity for retirees looking to downsize or a developer looking for the next project. Both bedrooms have built in robes & the bathroom has a shower over a step up spa bath and separate tiled shower, European laundry, 2 toilets and all supplied by solar hot water. The 3kw solar panels also feed back into the main grid. The galley kitchen features gas cooking & plenty of cupboard space and overlooks the private backyard. Both the kitchen & the lounge/dining area feature polished hardwood floors & sliding doors lead out to the undercover sunroom. Gas ducted heating keeps the whole house warm in winter & a spit system for cooling in the warmer months. The back yard, full of beautiful trees and shrubs has been terraced & features an open entertaining area & pathway that leads to the separate vegetable garden & gardening shed for ample storage. There is also a single car lock up garage with remote access, 2 water tanks and the fully fenced front & backyard will keep the kids and four legged friends safe. This property is a must see, as this little gem is a rare find!
**CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!**
Bethany Day 0438 844 968 or Grant Day 0417 565 745

Description:
ABOVE THE REST IN EVERY WAY ON 8027m2
Set high to provide an amazing view and drenched in natural light, this beautifully presented home offers stylish decor and a sense of space and openness that is rarely found along with quality timber features and the character of soaring vaulted ceilings and attic style rooms upstairs. The full length of the first level is dedicated to living areas that include cosy places to nestle back in front of the solid fuel fire, television room to enjoy your favourite show and expansive open living that could play host to a variety of entertainment events or give every member of the family the space they need to stretch out and really enjoy themselves. Polished floorboards add beauty and large windows and French doors allow the outdoor to frame the home in the natural beauty that surrounds. The kitchen features stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, plenty of bench space and cupboards and has a sunny eating area that is the perfect place to enjoy brunch on the weekend. There are five bedrooms, one on the first level. There are four bedrooms upstairs plus a living area that is ideal as a children's playroom/tv room or study. Imagine waking up in the luxurious master suite to the sight of rolling pasture and distant hills. A reverse cycle heating and cooling unit and 2.5 kw solar system add to your enjoyment of the home and save you money on bills. Outside is a haven for trades person, hobbyist or those who have a variety of 'toys', with a double garage under roofline, huge three car carport and a separate 3 car colourbond garage complete with workshop. Remote gates, sealed driveway and plenty of room for pets and children to romp, completes this one of a kind property. A short drive to the wonderful township of Emerald or Monbulk and with school buses passing, make this your home today.
Insights: 108 Emerald Monbulk Road, Emerald VIC 3782 was last sold in 2020 and 9 other 5 bedroom house in Emerald have recently been sold.

Description:
Escape at Home
Ascending the sealed driveway past the tree ferns you will be charmed by the aspect unveiled: A character cottage in monochrome hues with gabled windows and two inviting verandas, generous enough to host your morning coffee.
This house has been revived with subtle attention to detail and new carpeting. From the entrance hall with shining tiles you enter into an expansive living area with a glorious cathedral ceiling and mezzanine that is bathed in light, heated with gas, and ready to relax you with its tranquil outlook.
The fabulous country kitchen and dining area offer a bright and bounteous space to cook up an array of delights and to thoroughly enjoy the fruits of your labours.
The master bedroom is spacious with its own private veranda. From the walk in wardrobe, you have a private entrance to the bathroom which features a skylight in the cathedral ceiling above a spa bath. On this level you will also find; the secluded 4th bedroom which would make a picture-perfect home office, separate toilet with basin and the laundry.
Upstairs, a beautiful pair of bedrooms with gorgeous gabled character windows view both forest to the front and the open sunny aspect to the rear. They are connected by a mezzanine area, perfect as a comfortable reading nook or adorable playspace.
Enjoy dining outside in the hanging garden or warm yourself with a tipple around the fire pit, whilst the children can play house in the cubby or search for fairies dancing in the lanterns under the trees.
Follow the birdsong to this peaceful and spacious home in the hills.
*Inspection available by Virtual Tour
Insights: 13 Ladd Road, Emerald VIC 3782 was last sold in 2020 and 29 other 4 bedroom house in Emerald have recently been sold.

Description:
MODERN MASTERPIECE ON OVER 1500M2
Superbly located and sitting on one of the best blocks the Hills has to offer, is this stunning fully renovated home that offers the perfect mix of modern living and the Hills lifestyle you've been craving.
As you walk through the front door the quality of the home will instantly impress as Spotted Gum hardwood floors flow throughout and the modern color scheme and contemporary style blend everything together as if straight out of a magazine.
With open-plan living in mind the impressive kitchen featuring stone benchtops, electric cooking, plenty of cupboard space and beautiful feature black tapware and brushed sink. This room overlooks the dining area and onto the living area that boasts a soaring raked ceiling that creates a sense of space while the large windows allows natural light to flow through.
There are three bedrooms with the master fitted with built in robes. The bathroom provides the same quality finish as the rest of the home and features floor to ceiling tiles, bath, spacious shower and the latest tapware.
Outside you will find the massive deck that has been built for entertaining and is sure to be the new home for all your gatherings. The rear yard is fully fenced and boasts and abundance of space for kids and your furry friends to play safely.
Located within walking distance to the highly renowned BamBam's Italian restaurant, general store, secondary college, football field and netball courts along with public transport, this rare opportunity is sure to be snapped up quick, so call today to book your private inspection!!
Insights: 15 Macclesfield Road, Emerald VIC 3782 was last sold in 2020 and 34 other 3 bedroom house in Emerald have recently been sold.

Description:
Entertaining your bubble
Behind an adorable picket fence with ornamental gable house stands this gorgeous and delightfully renovated four-bedroom home. With spectacular views, all the way to Port Phillip Bay, entertaining will be a joy on the fabulous full-length verandas hexagonal bbq deck. Inside, glossy hardwood floors set the scene for this beautifully lit, warm (ducted heating & split system) home. The airy living area opens onto the decking with floor to ceiling bi-fold doors that feature an innovative hidden retractable full-length sliding fly screen. The spacious kitchen features sparkling white Caesarstone island and benches and houses a Miele dishwasher, double-sized oven and double-sized fridge space. A cleverly disguised laundry room behind cupboard doors is neatly hidden from sight and mind.
The four bedrooms are carpeted in a modish grey and each has a ceiling fan and a large BIR. The two smaller rooms look over the beautifully maintained fully fenced rear garden lawn. The two larger bedrooms enjoy that spectacular view to the front. The master boasts sliding door access and a neat ensuite. The family bathroom is a great size.
The artfully designed formal front garden hosts mature Conifers, clipped hedges and white standard roses. Further goodies on offer include sealed driveway, carport and the garage/workshop. But the icing on the cake is the separate under house room with glass doors that can be simply transformed into the new-era must-have: a work-from-home office/studio; a vast space that could house a variety of projects.
Come and enjoy the never-ending horizon.
Insights: 15 Boundary Road West, Emerald VIC 3782 was last sold in 2020 and 29 other 4 bedroom house in Emerald have recently been sold.

Description:
Prime Land, Sensational Views, Perfect Location & 25 Meg Pumping Licence!
If you're looking for amazing acreage with magnificent views then you can stop looking - here it is!
Offered the first time in 70 years, just over 37 acres of stunning clear grazing land. With an elevated aspect, this property provides truly incredible views of the rich green tapestry of the surrounding Gembrook hills.
The residence comprises of a 3 bedroom brick home with a large kitchen, machinery shedding, spring fed dam, 25 Meg litre water licence and 3 phase power to dam and house.
With dual road access to this property - from Main Street or Orchard Road and just walking distance to Gembrook township with plenty of shopping and dining options, this is truly is an amazing opportunity to purchase prime land in the heart of Gembrook.
**CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!**
Aaron Day 0407 365 994 or Tyson Bluhm 0437 843 820

Description:
LOW MAINTENANCE HIDEAWAY WITH SHED ON 1 ACRE
If you are looking for a quiet, tranquil home to come back to after a busy day, this inviting 3-bedroom, 2 bathroom brick veneer home, on a no through road, is looking for a new owner. Set on an acre of land with its own woodland and bird attracting fauna this property is sure to rejuvenate your love of nature and the outdoors. The current owners have enjoyed visiting wildlife, the ducks, rosellas, currajongs, kookaburras and the families of King Parrots that call this area their home as well. You may even see the occasional Wombat wander past!
The interior of the home is set up well for growing families and the custom designed Tassie Oak cabinetry in the kitchen is beautifully finished and with a separate grill, wall oven, cook tops and dishwasher is set up ready and waiting for the next budding chef.
THE WOW FACTOR:
The rear huge decking has been built to last with all metal construction except the timber flooring which is protected from the elements and it is sure to be a favourite spot for entertainers all year round, it affords a tree top outlook with views to a dam in the distance.
ADDED EXTRAS:
This AV Jennings home was built in 1990 and has concrete stumps and brick piers, insulation in the walls and ceiling. All the windows are lockable and have flyscreens. External doors have security doors.
Each bedroom has a split system for heating and cooling. There is a wood fire in the family room and split system in the lounge. A 6x9 meter garage is also an excellent bonus.
Private and peaceful this property may be but, that doesnt mean it lacks convenience as it is within close proximity to Gembrook Township, pre and primary schools. With Pakenham or Emerald just 15 minutes away you also have a choice for senior education nearby. Come and see how your family can settle here and enjoy, peace and quiet in a lovely country community. We are looking forward to showing you through, so call Mick Dolphin 0429 684 522 or Janet Hawkins on 0409 117 432 to arrange your inspection today.
https://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
Please note: All property details listed were current at the time of publishing.

Description:
Dream Starter!
Every now and then you come across a house that really feels like home. And this is it.
This home sits proudly on a generous 1/4 acre in the natural Avonsleigh surrounds with views into the hills of Wright's forest.
The front of the home features a generous veranda where you can sit and listen to the sounds of wildlife in the sunshine over your morning coffee.
The double colonial style sliding front doors welcome you into the light filled home with comfortable carpeted lounge room and neutral colour scheme. Beyond the lounge is a functional kitchen with plenty of bench space and adjoining dining area with windows that let the light in and provide views over the rear yard and into the distance.
The bedrooms, 2 with built in robes, are located along the hallway and serviced by the large main bathroom. The laundry is cleverly tucked away behind double doors in a contemporary European style.
There is also a study with stunning views that will inspire you to work or study hard to be your best, without the stress.
From the study is an exit that takes you onto a spacious covered timber deck with bistro blinds; the perfect place for entertaining with family and friends, watching the little ones play or just watching the continuous display of life thriving everywhere in such a majestic place.
The land is punctuated with tree ferns and native shrubs to encourage wildlife, and a healthy, maintained gum tree in the middle of the rear yard that is the envy of the town.
The home also features gas ducted heating, air conditioner, single lock up garage, single carport and garden shed.
Everything about this house feels like a home. Don't miss the opportunity to view.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Samantha Scott 0438 680 032
